import { Box, Stack, Button, Center } from '@chakra-ui/react'; import { useState } from 'react'; const Palette = () => { const [palette, setPalette] = useState({ one : '#cd84f1', two : '#ffcccc', three : '#ff4d4d', four : '#c56cf0', five : '#ffb8b8', six : '#ff3838', seven : '#32ff7e', eight : '#7efff5', nine : '#18dcff' }) return (
); } export default Palette;
